findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The massUpdatePools() function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change KnightPerBlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change KnightPerBlock.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change fee address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the fee address.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change dev address
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to change the developer's address.
